name: id
description: The DOM ID of the bottom drawer element.

name: isDrawerActive
description: Determines if the bottom drawer is active and should be displayed.

name: isFocusTrapActive
description: Determines if the focus is trapped within the bottom drawer when it's active.

name: hasFullHeight
description: Determines if the bottom drawer should take the full height of the given viewport.

name: maxHeight
description: The maximum height of the bottom drawer element, given as a Tailwind CSS class.
